channel.description: Bash Review Questions Q. You want to change the command prompt for yourself. Where (the bash shell file) would you define it so that you get the custom command prompt whenever you log in? A. You can define it in the ~/.bash_profile file. Q. What is the other name for the command line completion feature? A. The other name for the command line completion feature is tab completion. Q. What is a common use of the pipe symbol? A. A common use of the pipe character is to receive the output of one command and pass it along to the next command as an input.
